articles.author: Harry Sherlock
articles.title: Man Utd or Bayern Munich? Former Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane makes preference for next job clear - Goal.com
articles.description: Zinedine Zidane would prefer to join Manchester United as opposed to Bayern Munich this summer, according to a new report.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: F1 teams and Pirelli had no warning of "painted" Shanghai track surface - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Neither Formula 1 teams nor tyre supplier Pirelli were informed about the "painted" surface treatment at the Shanghai circuit before arriving in China for this weekend's race.
articles.content: With F1 teams having done a lot of pre-event work in the simulator based on information from both Pirelli and the FIA, they were caught out when they arrived at the circuit on Wednesday by the visibl… [+2994 chars]
